Kids Superhero T Shirts.title: Marvel Boy's Captain America Retro T-Shirt
about_this_item: BOYS CAPTAIN AMERICA SHIELD SHORT-SLEEVE T SHIRT: Captain America. You know him, you love him. The world-renowned Marvel Comics, creator of the most iconic superheroes and villains dominating box offices today has led the way for publishing since 1939. The bold logos of these legendary figures make for striking printed t-shirts, sweatshirts, hoodies and accessories with this collection of official licensed product from Marvel Comics.

THEIR NEW FAVORITE TEE: Perfectly sized for kids aged 7+, our mid weight graphic tee is a stylish nod to nostalgia. Worn fitted or oversized, careful crafting and sublime softness make this fun and functional tee the ideal birthday present or holiday gift.

SHRINK & FADE RESISTANT: Featuring a ribbed crew neckline, relaxed fit silhouette, and straight hemline, our preshrunk short sleeve tagless tee is engineered for comfort. Casual and classic, this mix & match top is perfect for everything from game nights to lazy Saturdays.
OFFICIALLY LICENSED: 100% authenticity is our bond. This unique design was created by our talented in-house team of graphic artists. Accept no substitutes. Printed in Plymouth, England.
GREAT FOR GIVING: The perfect gift for the Super Fan in your life, our high quality shirt is ideal for casual school days, or for just lounging around.

Kids Superhero T Shirts.title: Marvel Boys 3 Pack Avengers T-Shirts Hulk Iron Man Captain America Kids Dress Up Tops Short Sleeved Tees
about_this_item: OFFICIAL MARVEL TEES: These short sleeve t-shirts are official Avengers merchandise and are fully licensed from Marvel studios. Each set includes 3 short sleeved t-shirts that include the iconic designs of the legendary Super Heroes, Iron Man, Hulk and Captain America, all are in a dress up design so your little hero can be a different super hero every day.

EXCELLENT QUALITY: High quality officially licensed Marvel merchandise. Our tops are made from lightweight, but strong 100% cotton for comfort and durability. The design is a short sleeved tee in a dress up design. Super soft on the skin. Buy with confidence in all our official Marvel products.

UNIQUE MARVEL GIFTS: These t-shirts make great unique gifts for kids. Perfect as a special gift and can be worn with many different outfits for any occasion. about_this_item: OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT - 100% Official DC Comics The Flash merchandise. Designed and branded by Popgear, completely original and unique.

THE SCARLET SPEEDSTER - Barry Allen first sped into the pages of DC comics in 1956, and has been a regular fixture in some of DC's biggest and most compelling stories ever since. There have been may speedsters over the years, and even other versions of The Flash, but Barry has always been the person most closely connected to the role. His popularity has even carried him from the comics to the screen in the form of his own TV series and an appearance in the Justice League movie.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA - This is an awesome gift for any boy who loves DC Comics looking to lounge about the house watching their favourite DCEU movies or Arrowverse series or hang out with friends. Whether it's for a son, nephew, grandson, stepson, brother or just a friend who loves The Flash, this really is an amazing birthday or Christmas gift.

SUPER SOFT COTTON - The t-shirt is made from 100% super soft cotton available in red and sizes from 3-4yrs to 14-15yrs. Crew neck finish with cotton and lycra rib and single needle stitching, self fabric shoulder to shoulder taping and a fashionable high street fit.

ABOUT POPGEAR - What we have that’s different, is a product made from passion. A true passion for pop culture, whether that's the excitement for the opening night of your favourite movie or the memories you create at your first music festival. Our mission is to make products that allow anyone and everyone feel like a champion of their own identity, empowering fans of all ages to show the world what their fandom means to them. Our products are made for the fans, by the fans!

about_this_item: MARVEL BOYS T-SHIRT AND SHORTS PYJAMAS SET - The Marvel pyjamas are perfect for lounging and watching their favourite superhero movies in style. The set comes with a short sleeve t-shirt and short bottoms making them ideal for getting cosy at bedtime.

CHILDREN'S SLEEPWEAR IS AVAILABLE IN A VARIETY OF SIZES - The clothing comes in various sizes, ensuring we have the perfect fit for your little heroes. They offer a regular fit with an elasticated waistband and are made for ultimate comfort, perfect for gifting at Christmas and birthdays.

MIXED MATERIALS - The t-shirt's front body is made of 100% polyester, while the back and sleeves are 100% cotton, ensuring a comfortable fit. Whilst the shorts are 100% cotton, making the set soft and lightweight perfect for a cosy night's sleep.

THOR, IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA AND HULK SUPERHEROES - The novelty Grey and Black pyjamas feature their favourite superheroes with the official Marvel logo. The set is a must-have for those Marvel fans.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED MARVEL MERCHANDISE – The outfit is 100% official Marvel merchandise. To get the most out of this product, please be sure to wash dark colours separately at 30℃, wash inside out, reshape whilst damp and do not iron the motif.

about_this_item: OFFICIALLY LICENSED PRODUCT - 100% Official DC Comics The Flash merchandise. Designed and branded by Popgear, completely original and unique.

THE SCARLET SPEEDSTER - Barry Allen first sped into the pages of DC comics in 1956, and has been a regular fixture in some of DC's biggest and most compelling stories ever since. There have been may speedsters over the years, and even other versions of The Flash, but Barry has always been the person most closely connected to the role. His popularity has even carried him from the comics to the screen in the form of his own TV series and an appearance in the Justice League movie.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA - This is an awesome gift for any boy who loves DC Comics looking to lounge about the house watching their favourite DCEU movies or Arrowverse series or hang out with friends. Whether it's for a son, nephew, grandson, stepson, brother or just a friend who loves The Flash, this really is an amazing birthday or Christmas gift.

SUPER SOFT COTTON - The t-shirt is made from 100% super soft cotton available in red and sizes from 3-4yrs to 14-15yrs. Crew neck finish with cotton and lycra rib and single needle stitching, self fabric shoulder to shoulder taping and a fashionable high street fit.

ABOUT POPGEAR - What we have that’s different, is a product made from passion. A true passion for pop culture, whether that's the excitement for the opening night of your favourite movie or the memories you create at your first music festival. Our mission is to make products that allow anyone and everyone feel like a champion of their own identity, empowering fans of all ages to show the world what their fandom means to them. Our products are made for the fans, by the fans!

The Man5.0 out of 5 starsVKO Camera Strap (Green) – A Budget-Friendly Gem for Leica Q3 and BeyondReviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 March 2025Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseAs a Leica Q3 owner, I was initially tempted by the premium camera straps offered by Leica and other high-end brands. However, after trying the VKO Camera Strap, I’m thrilled to say I found a fantastic alternative that delivers both style and functionality at a fraction of the price. Here’s why I’m so impressed with this strap:Design and Build Quality: Rugged and StylishThe VKO Camera Strap is made from durable climbing rope, which gives it a rugged, outdoorsy vibe while still looking sleek and modern. The green color adds a pop of personality, and the adjustable length makes it versatile for neck, shoulder, or crossbody wear. The quick-release buckles are sturdy and easy to use, allowing me to attach or detach the strap from my Leica Q3 in seconds.Despite its affordable price, the strap feels well-made and reliable. The stitching is solid, and the materials used (including the metal hardware) feel robust enough to handle daily use. It’s clear that VKO didn’t cut corners on quality.Comfort: Lightweight and AdjustableOne of the standout features of this strap is its comfort. The climbing rope material is soft yet strong, and it doesn’t dig into my neck or shoulder, even during long photography sessions. The adjustable length allows me to customize the fit perfectly, whether I’m wearing it as a neck strap or slinging it across my body for a more secure carry.Compared to the more expensive straps I’ve tried, the VKO strap holds its own in terms of comfort and practicality. It’s lightweight enough to not add unnecessary bulk but sturdy enough to support my Leica Q3 with confidence.Functionality: Perfect for Everyday UseThe quick-release mechanism is a game-changer. It makes switching between handheld shooting and using the strap incredibly easy, which is especially useful when I’m on the go. The strap also stays securely in place, so I never have to worry about my camera slipping or falling.I’ve used this strap for street photography, travel, and even casual outings, and it’s performed flawlessly every time. It’s a great match for the Leica Q3, complementing the camera’s premium design without overshadowing it.Value for Money: A Steal Compared to Premium BrandsAt a fraction of the cost of Leica’s own straps or other high-end options, the VKO Camera Strap offers incredible value. It delivers the same level of functionality and comfort as straps that cost three or four times as much. For anyone looking to save money without compromising on quality, this is an excellent choice.Final ThoughtsThe VKO Camera Strap has become my go-to accessory for my Leica Q3. about_this_item: SD Card Reader for iPhone and USB C Card Reader: The USB C SD/Micro SD Card Reader is an incredibly versatile and convenient accessory for anyone who works with digital media. With its 2-in-2 design, this card reader works with iPhone or USB-C ports, and it has slots for both SD and TF cards, which makes transferring photos, videos, and files really easy. SD Card Reader for iPhone iPad offers seamless compatibility with a wide range of devices, suitable for iPhone 15/iPad/Mac/laptops, etc.

Compatible Memory Card: SD Card Reader with dual slots for Micro SD and SD cards, this reader offers seamless compatibility with a wide range of memory cards, such as: Micro SD, Micro SDHC, Micro SDXC, SD, SDHC, SDXC, MMC Micro, RS MMC card. There is no need for any third-party apps, just use your phone's built-in file or photo app. It works without Wi-Fi, internet, or extra power. Plus, it supports two-way transfers, so you can move files both to and from your SD/TF card easily.

Plug and play: The SD card reader is plug and play, no drivers required for iPhone/iPad/MacBook/iMac/Windows. Compatible with SD/Micro SD cards, memory card reader adapter lets you easily view photos and videos from a variety of camera memory cards and allows you to instantly view upload the best moments of your shots anytime, USB C SD card adapter is compatible with iPhone 15 series (USB Type C connector). Easily transfer photos and videos to your USB-C iPhone 15 Plus Pro Max iPad Pro/Air/Mini.

Dual Connector Design: This card reader with both USB-C and apple connector. Just insert an SD card (up to 256GB) into the reader then plug it into your phone with iPhone or USB-C depending on which phone you have. With its Micro SD and SD card slots, you can easily transfer and access your files on the go. It reads RAW files too, which is great direct from your camera. (The SD card reader supports standard photo formats including JPEG, RAW and 4K video formats including H.264 and MPEG-4.)

Sharing Beauty: This is a compact card reader offering a convenient means of reading from or writing to SD and micro-SD cards so can transfer photos and data between devices, which allows you to get your card footage from cameras, surveillance/bird feeder etc on to your tablet and phone, and even more devices. This means you can shoot photos at your family holidays on a DSLR or Mirrorless Camera, then pull them off to your phone and share them while you're there.

Rain Bow5.0 out of 5 starsTarion Camera Backpack - better than expectedReviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2025Size Name: SColour Name: BlackVerified PurchaseThere are many camera bags and backpacks on the market so it is never easy to whittle down a shortlist to one product. Amazon has some excellent camera bags on offer and all come with good pictures and descriptions from the sellers - and they come in a variety of sizes and price ranges.This Tarion backpack arrived simply packaged in a plastic bag (inside an Amazon postage pack, naturally) and I have to say I felt confident as soon as I picked it up. This isn't a big backpack by any means but is plenty big enough for the average user. The fabric feels solid and has been stitched perfectly throughout, the sides and base are quite firm (some backpacks and bags have soft sides), and the double zip feels plenty strong enough.The base of the backpack has two straps that can be used to hold a tripod - I like this position because it means the backpack's centre of gravity remains stable and the pack won't tilt to one side as it would if a tripod was fixed to a side. On the outside is quite a deep, zipped pocket (unpadded) and with two small mesh pockets on either side. The interior of the bag has the usual removeable velcro sections so that you can create an interior design that suits you - camera bodies, lenses, accessories, whatever. I generally keep a medium telephoto lens on my main camera (Nikon 7500) and it fits perfect in the top centre section (that also has a retaining strap) and still leaves plenty of room in sections beneath it.This is not an expensive backpack, and it even contains a waterproof rain cover should the weather change when you are out of doors. It feels quality, my camera equipment feels nicely protected, it is easy to carry either over one shoulder or over two. For an everyday bag to hold equipment this is ideal, and is plenty good enough if you just need some safe indoor storage.I could find nothing to fault with this product. It looks good, it looks expensive (it isn't expensive at all). The only little niggle I could come across is the padded inserts - I felt they could have been better padded, but there are more than good enouogh to keep equipment separate and decently protected in the backpack. An easy 5 star rating and I can certainly recommend this for anyone looking for a basic, everyday backpack with no frills but still having the feel of good quality.Read moreOne person found this helpfulHelpfulReport

about_this_item: The padded insert camera partition comes with 3 removable and adjustable taped cushions. It can be constructed into many small partitions, each of which can house a standard zoom lens. The camera partition padded insert bag is anti-shock and separates your camera body and lenses with other belongings in your travel backpack.
The camera backpack is multi-functional. If needed, you can remove the padded interior to be a casual daypack or travel bag which is quite spacious.
Keep your camera equipment safe and organized. It can hold 13.3 inch laptop in the dedicated pocket.

Trefor5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Bag! .. Perfect ! I added a couple of extra inserts.Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 September 2019Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseUpdate after 5 Years of use…I came back as I’m thinking of buying another one for my fishing gear.. and saw my own review.. just thought I’d add.. I’m ‘still’ using the bag weekly for photography kit. now into my 6th year! .. the only thing that’s worn a bit is some of the internal lining around the zipped compartments which has split and torn a bit but the main structure of the bag is still completely solid. I regularly stuff it with a fairly heavy camera lenses and binoculars etc .. as well as a seat pad in the back section and numerous bits and pieces in the compartments.. overall still completely happy and no plans to get a new bag yet.. apart from the duplicate for fishing!———————-Update After a year of constant use.. Still great! Hard wearing and super comfortable.. some slight wear to straps where I keep adjusting when full of gear but not much of a problem..I’m adjusting it a bit more carefully now. I would still buy again without hesitation—————————————————————-Update Jan 2020—> Love this bag! I’ve just come back from a trip dragging it around Marrakech for a week full of camera gear etc.. solid as a rock. really comfortable. if I lost this one I’d buy another one right away..——————-I wanted to wait until I returned from a 2 week trip walking with and using the bag daily before I posted a review.. I’ve just returned from a trip scrambling around on the Pembrokshire coastal paths so I’ve put this through it’s paces in a live situation.## Update end of Nov.. I’ve been using it several times a week.. great rucksack.. can’t fault it so far !## First impressions - The bag is exactly what I’ve been looking for form an appearance point of view, understated, casual, sturdy and the green fits in with the darker shades/cameo type clothing I wear for wildlife photography...perfect## Inserts - My initial reaction to the inside of the bag was ‘I’m not sure this is going to work out’ ... in honesty the one reason for the 4 stars is that the bags inserts are not numerous / stiff enough.. luckily I had an old lowepro slingshot and was able to steal some from this.. these I have seen these inserts for sale online and my view having used the bag is that the rest of it is so useful and comfortable that it’s worth spending a couple of pounds on adding some.# Comfort - Can’t fault it.. sits really well on my back, plenty of easy adjustment, didn’t get too hot..no points dig in.. great# Durability-waterproof - it feels strong and well put together, canvas is the right mix of stiff versus soft to give the bag some form but keep it comfortable. I would say without having tested this aspect too much that the bag would provide good shower protection but if you’re off into the rain forest during monsoon season I’d look for a dry bag instead. I will spray some wax coating on when I get around to it which will help I think. The zips look and feel fine,, not massively heavy duty.. but no indication they’re likely to give a problem.# Utility - I’ve got a largish (for a mirrorless..) Olympus Em1x body attached to a 300mm lens (about 12” length in total) and this fits in the main compartment, as well as 3 spare smaller lenses and cables/bits in the net pockets... the top ‘shelf’ is configurable to make more space in the main part of the bag if required.. I’ve still got enough space in the top for keys, phone etc... maybe a couple of flattish sandwiches .. the water bottle / small tripod holder is very handy.. I mostly hand shoot, so used this for water. The metal magnetic press studs work well and gave me no trouble at all.# Verdict - I’m really happy with it.. pleasure to use so far and just the right size for a day out, I’d buy again! Worth sourcing a few better inserts as a bag that ‘works’ is well worth having and adds to the quality of your day out time and time again. I do regularly update reviews if a product fails prematurely .. so no news here so far is good news!Read moreTrefor5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Bag! .. Perfect ! Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 starsSolid pack, rugged look, safe for your kitReviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 July 2019Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseOkay, this is good.Really, really, REALLY good.The build is solid, zips are excellent quality and have lockable loops for you to slip a padlock through easily. The canvas is tough, heavy, and thick, and will shrug off rain showers happily. It might not be fully waterproof, but it does the job. I've really thrown this thing about and it has kept my kit safe and clean. The canvas makes this really durable.The magnetic clips are secure, and feel nice and tight. A handy side pocket will keep either a large bottle or tripod happily with no fear of it falling out.Design wise, this pack is seriously well thought out. It's not enormous, and if you're lugging 2 DSLR bodies and several lenses look elsewhere, but for essential kit this is ideal. I usually carry my Canon 7D (with battery grip), a Tamaron 18-270mm lens, a Sigma 10-20mm lens, a 50mm, and a telephoto lens. All of this whilst carrying my GoPro and all the straps and kit with that. It's velcro internal dividers help you configure the pack however you want, and this gives it huge flexibility. What's nice is the top compartment is separate (via a removable divider, so if you want 1 huge space, go for it) allowing me to keep some non photography essential bits in there (such as chargers, documents, passport, wallet etc). The side pocket access to the main compartment is useful, as it allows you to make quick lens changes whilst on the move. All the access areas have large zipped mesh pouches, providing the perfect space for lens covers, SD/CF cards, spare wires, and even phones and wallets if you're trying not to get pickpocketed. It has a large zipped laptop pouch to the rear of pack, so your laptop is safe and well padded. It fits my 13.3 inch Mac no problem, so this is ideal when on the move.What makes another nice feature is it doesn't look like a camera bag, and it doesn't scream EXPENSIVE GEAR IN HERE.So for whatever your needs, whether you need a second pack to keep some extra gear, a bag to keep in your car for when you see the perfect shot, or a bag to lug around on adventures keeping your kit safe, this bag is for you. It's easy to fly with and is small enough to use as cabin baggage on most airlines, it's durable, safe, and protective of your kit.Considering the price, this is an absolute steal. I'd not be shocked to see this advertised for at least 100.If you need a bag for your camera kit, buy this. Enough said.Read moreAmazon Customer5.0 out of 5 starsSolid pack, rugged look, safe for your kitReviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 July 2019Okay, this is good.Really, really, REALLY good.The build is solid, zips are excellent quality and have lockable loops for you to slip a padlock through easily. Raev4.0 out of 5 starsDecent...if your shoulders are smallReviewed in the United Kingdom on 14 July 2022Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseFirst of all, this is a good backpack. Has plenty of room for its size, is modular with thick compartment walls and thr canvas seems sturdy.There two drawbacks (for me, at least):1. The straps end up cutting into your armpit. I have fairly broad shoulders and when I put 7kg of gear in this, the narrow part of the strap ended up cutting into my armpit. This is probably the worst I can say and it was a dealbreaker for me.2. The top part has a separate, smaller compartment. Great if you want to stash spare clothes, a snack, a mini drone or whatever. BUT! It takes away from the main compartment space and turns what could have been a versatile small backpack that could carry a longer zoom lens (300-500mm anyone) into a...small(er) backpack. It still fits a mirrorless + tele + normal + one prime that's not too big (think 35mm f/1.4).Overall, better than some cheap plasticky materials and way sturdier too. But if you're bulkier...perhaps try something else.Read moreOne person found this helpfulHelpfulReport

I added a couple of extra inserts.Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 4 September 2019Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseUpdate after 5 Years of use…I came back as I’m thinking of buying another one for my fishing gear.. and saw my own review.. just thought I’d add.. I’m ‘still’ using the bag weekly for photography kit. now into my 6th year! .. the only thing that’s worn a bit is some of the internal lining around the zipped compartments which has split and torn a bit but the main structure of the bag is still completely solid. I regularly stuff it with a fairly heavy camera lenses and binoculars etc .. as well as a seat pad in the back section and numerous bits and pieces in the compartments.. overall still completely happy and no plans to get a new bag yet.. apart from the duplicate for fishing!———————-Update After a year of constant use.. Still great! Hard wearing and super comfortable.. some slight wear to straps where I keep adjusting when full of gear but not much of a problem..I’m adjusting it a bit more carefully now. I would still buy again without hesitation—————————————————————-Update Jan 2020—> Love this bag! I’ve just come back from a trip dragging it around Marrakech for a week full of camera gear etc.. solid as a rock. really comfortable. if I lost this one I’d buy another one right away..——————-I wanted to wait until I returned from a 2 week trip walking with and using the bag daily before I posted a review.. I’ve just returned from a trip scrambling around on the Pembrokshire coastal paths so I’ve put this through it’s paces in a live situation.## Update end of Nov.. I’ve been using it several times a week.. great rucksack.. can’t fault it so far !## First impressions - The bag is exactly what I’ve been looking for form an appearance point of view, understated, casual, sturdy and the green fits in with the darker shades/cameo type clothing I wear for wildlife photography...perfect## Inserts - My initial reaction to the inside of the bag was ‘I’m not sure this is going to work out’ ... in honesty the one reason for the 4 stars is that the bags inserts are not numerous / stiff enough.. luckily I had an old lowepro slingshot and was able to steal some from this.. these I have seen these inserts for sale online and my view having used the bag is that the rest of it is so useful and comfortable that it’s worth spending a couple of pounds on adding some.# Comfort - Can’t fault it.. sits really well on my back, plenty of easy adjustment, didn’t get too hot..no points dig in.. great# Durability-waterproof - it feels strong and well put together, canvas is the right mix of stiff versus soft to give the bag some form but keep it comfortable. I would say without having tested this aspect too much that the bag would provide good shower protection but if you’re off into the rain forest during monsoon season I’d look for a dry bag instead. I will spray some wax coating on when I get around to it which will help I think. The zips look and feel fine,, not massively heavy duty.. but no indication they’re likely to give a problem.# Utility - I’ve got a largish (for a mirrorless..) Olympus Em1x body attached to a 300mm lens (about 12” length in total) and this fits in the main compartment, as well as 3 spare smaller lenses and cables/bits in the net pockets... the top ‘shelf’ is configurable to make more space in the main part of the bag if required.. I’ve still got enough space in the top for keys, phone etc... maybe a couple of flattish sandwiches .. the water bottle / small tripod holder is very handy.. I mostly hand shoot, so used this for water. The metal magnetic press studs work well and gave me no trouble at all.# Verdict - I’m really happy with it.. pleasure to use so far and just the right size for a day out, I’d buy again! Worth sourcing a few better inserts as a bag that ‘works’ is well worth having and adds to the quality of your day out time and time again. I’ve just come back from a trip dragging it around Marrakech for a week full of camera gear etc.. solid as a rock. really comfortable. if I lost this one I’d buy another one right away..——————-I wanted to wait until I returned from a 2 week trip walking with and using the bag daily before I posted a review.. I’ve just returned from a trip scrambling around on the Pembrokshire coastal paths so I’ve put this through it’s paces in a live situation.## Update end of Nov.. I’ve been using it several times a week.. great rucksack.. can’t fault it so far !## First impressions - The bag is exactly what I’ve been looking for form an appearance point of view, understated, casual, sturdy and the green fits in with the darker shades/cameo type clothing I wear for wildlife photography...perfect## Inserts - My initial reaction to the inside of the bag was ‘I’m not sure this is going to work out’ ... in honesty the one reason for the 4 stars is that the bags inserts are not numerous / stiff enough.. luckily I had an old lowepro slingshot and was able to steal some from this.. these I have seen these inserts for sale online and my view having used the bag is that the rest of it is so useful and comfortable that it’s worth spending a couple of pounds on adding some.# Comfort - Can’t fault it.. sits really well on my back, plenty of easy adjustment, didn’t get too hot..no points dig in.. great# Durability-waterproof - it feels strong and well put together, canvas is the right mix of stiff versus soft to give the bag some form but keep it comfortable. I would say without having tested this aspect too much that the bag would provide good shower protection but if you’re off into the rain forest during monsoon season I’d look for a dry bag instead. I will spray some wax coating on when I get around to it which will help I think. The zips look and feel fine,, not massively heavy duty.. but no indication they’re likely to give a problem.# Utility - I’ve got a largish (for a mirrorless..) Olympus Em1x body attached to a 300mm lens (about 12” length in total) and this fits in the main compartment, as well as 3 spare smaller lenses and cables/bits in the net pockets... the top ‘shelf’ is configurable to make more space in the main part of the bag if required.. I’ve still got enough space in the top for keys, phone etc... maybe a couple of flattish sandwiches .. the water bottle / small tripod holder is very handy.. I mostly hand shoot, so used this for water. The metal magnetic press studs work well and gave me no trouble at all.# Verdict - I’m really happy with it.. pleasure to use so far and just the right size for a day out, I’d buy again! Worth sourcing a few better inserts as a bag that ‘works’ is well worth having and adds to the quality of your day out time and time again. I do regularly update reviews if a product fails prematurely .. so no news here so far is good news!Images in this review30 people found this helpfulHelpfulReport

Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 starsSolid pack, rugged look, safe for your kitReviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 July 2019Colour Name: GreenVerified PurchaseOkay, this is good.Really, really, REALLY good.The build is solid, zips are excellent quality and have lockable loops for you to slip a padlock through easily. The canvas is tough, heavy, and thick, and will shrug off rain showers happily. It might not be fully waterproof, but it does the job. I've really thrown this thing about and it has kept my kit safe and clean. The canvas makes this really durable.The magnetic clips are secure, and feel nice and tight. A handy side pocket will keep either a large bottle or tripod happily with no fear of it falling out.Design wise, this pack is seriously well thought out. It's not enormous, and if you're lugging 2 DSLR bodies and several lenses look elsewhere, but for essential kit this is ideal. I usually carry my Canon 7D (with battery grip), a Tamaron 18-270mm lens, a Sigma 10-20mm lens, a 50mm, and a telephoto lens. All of this whilst carrying my GoPro and all the straps and kit with that. It's velcro internal dividers help you configure the pack however you want, and this gives it huge flexibility. What's nice is the top compartment is separate (via a removable divider, so if you want 1 huge space, go for it) allowing me to keep some non photography essential bits in there (such as chargers, documents, passport, wallet etc). The side pocket access to the main compartment is useful, as it allows you to make quick lens changes whilst on the move. All the access areas have large zipped mesh pouches, providing the perfect space for lens covers, SD/CF cards, spare wires, and even phones and wallets if you're trying not to get pickpocketed. It has a large zipped laptop pouch to the rear of pack, so your laptop is safe and well padded. It fits my 13.3 inch Mac no problem, so this is ideal when on the move.What makes another nice feature is it doesn't look like a camera bag, and it doesn't scream EXPENSIVE GEAR IN HERE.So for whatever your needs, whether you need a second pack to keep some extra gear, a bag to keep in your car for when you see the perfect shot, or a bag to lug around on adventures keeping your kit safe, this bag is for you. It's easy to fly with and is small enough to use as cabin baggage on most airlines, it's durable, safe, and protective of your kit.Considering the price, this is an absolute steal. Amazon Customer5.0 out of 5 starsSchöne stabile Handschlaufe auch für schwere KamerasReviewed in Germany on 9 June 2025Verified PurchaseDiese Handschlaufe aus breitem Paracord ist sehr schön verarbeitet und fühlt sich sehr wertig an. Wenn man mal kurz eine freie Hand braucht, kann man die Kamera an der Schlaufe am Handgelenk unbesorgt hängen lassen, ohne, dass etwas passiert. Die Schlaufe zieht sich dann zu, schnürt einem aber auch nicht mit einer größeren spiegellosen Kamera mit mittelgroßen Objektiv unangenehm den Arm ab.Das Beste an der Schlaufe ist das Klick-Wechselsystem. Die Schlaufen können problemlos an alle Kameras angebracht werden (sogar neben anderen Haltesystemen, weil sie sehr schmal sind) und man kann sie beliebig per Klick wechseln. Obwohl die Bänder der Klick-Schlaufen ziemlich dünn sind, haben sie eine hohe Traglast und eignen sich problemlos auch für ein großes Teleobjektiv.Bei Lieferung sind 3 Klickschlaufen dabei, als Reserve oder für mehrere Kameras. Rain Bow5.0 out of 5 starsTarion Camera Backpack - better than expectedReviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2025Size Name: SColour Name: BlackVerified PurchaseThere are many camera bags and backpacks on the market so it is never easy to whittle down a shortlist to one product. Amazon has some excellent camera bags on offer and all come with good pictures and descriptions from the sellers - and they come in a variety of sizes and price ranges.This Tarion backpack arrived simply packaged in a plastic bag (inside an Amazon postage pack, naturally) and I have to say I felt confident as soon as I picked it up. This isn't a big backpack by any means but is plenty big enough for the average user. The fabric feels solid and has been stitched perfectly throughout, the sides and base are quite firm (some backpacks and bags have soft sides), and the double zip feels plenty strong enough.The base of the backpack has two straps that can be used to hold a tripod - I like this position because it means the backpack's centre of gravity remains stable and the pack won't tilt to one side as it would if a tripod was fixed to a side. On the outside is quite a deep, zipped pocket (unpadded) and with two small mesh pockets on either side. The interior of the bag has the usual removeable velcro sections so that you can create an interior design that suits you - camera bodies, lenses, accessories, whatever. I generally keep a medium telephoto lens on my main camera (Nikon 7500) and it fits perfect in the top centre section (that also has a retaining strap) and still leaves plenty of room in sections beneath it.This is not an expensive backpack, and it even contains a waterproof rain cover should the weather change when you are out of doors. It feels quality, my camera equipment feels nicely protected, it is easy to carry either over one shoulder or over two. For an everyday bag to hold equipment this is ideal, and is plenty good enough if you just need some safe indoor storage.I could find nothing to fault with this product. It looks good, it looks expensive (it isn't expensive at all). The only little niggle I could come across is the padded inserts - I felt they could have been better padded, but there are more than good enouogh to keep equipment separate and decently protected in the backpack. An easy 5 star rating and I can certainly recommend this for anyone looking for a basic, everyday backpack with no frills but still having the feel of good quality.Read moreOne person found this helpfulHelpfulReport

Long5.0 out of 5 starsGood value for money, decent qualityReviewed in the United Kingdom on 12 April 2024Size Name: SColour Name: BlackVerified PurchaseI bought this as the main storage and carry case for a new camera. Just the right amount of space for a body, a long lens (up to around 24cm in length) and a short zoom. Room enough for hoods and a charger, puffer, spare batteries and cards. Product Description: SHOOT AF Auto Focus Macro Extension Tube Set for Canon EOS EF EF-S Lens DSLR Cameras 1100D 700D 650D 600D 550D 500D 450D 400D 350D 300D 100D 70DThis Macro Extension Tube Set includes 3 extension tubes:13mm,21mm,31mm.Fits for all Canon EOS EF EF-S and IS series lenses, such as Canon EOS 1d,7D, 10D, 20D, 30D, 40D, 50D, Digital Rebel X, Rebel XT, Rebel XTi, Rebel XSi, 1100D, 700D, 650D, 600D, 550D , 500D, 450D, 400D, 350D, 300D, 100D....By using the Macro Extension Tube!These extension tubes are designed with all the circuitry and mechanical coupling to maintain auto focus and TTL auto exposure with Canon lenses, given there is enough light to activate the cameras AF system properly.Attach to camera or detach in the same way as attaching or detaching the camera's master lens.With Canon type of tube,be sure to attach master lens only after tube has been properly attached to camera body.Take care not to mistake this order lest it fails to couple with the TTL meter or the AE mechanism.This,however,does not apply to other types of tube.Suitable lenses are from standard to semi-telephoto as well as micro lenses.Wide-angle and zoom lenses are also usable,but depending on how the lens is combined with the tube distance between lens front and subject may become extremely close.Pictures shot by customersby JC Fernandezby Jocke with Canon 1100Dby JMTby patricia deblocqPackage Include:1 * Macro Extension Tube Set
By using the Macro Extension Tube!: These extension tubes are designed with all the circuitry and mechanical coupling to maintain auto focus and TTL auto exposure with Canon lenses, given there is enough light to activate the cameras AF system properly.Attach to camera or detach in the same way as attaching or detaching the camera's master lens.With Canon type of tube,be sure to attach master lens only after tube has been properly attached to camera body.Take care not to mistake this order lest it fails to couple with the TTL meter or the AE mechanism.This,however,does not apply to other types of tube.Suitable lenses are from standard to semi-telephoto as well as micro lenses.Wide-angle and zoom lenses are also usable,but depending on how the lens is combined with the tube distance between lens front and subject may become extremely close.

SOFT & DURABLE PLUSH MATERIAL – Made from high-quality, huggable fabric, this Spider-Man plush is both cuddly and strong. It’s perfect for bedtime snuggles or action-packed superhero play.

PERFECT SIZE FOR LITTLE HANDS – Lightweight and easy to handle, this Spider-Man plush is designed for kids aged 3 and up. Whether playing at home or on the go, Spidey is always ready for action!
GREAT GIFT FOR MARVEL FANS – A must-have for Spidey and His Amazing Friends lovers, this fun and interactive plush toy makes an ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or any young superhero in training.

about_this_item: 【Accurate measurement】The digital measuring spoon adopts a high-precision sensor, accurate to 0.1g, which can accurately sense the change of food weight, so that we can easily master the balanced proportion of food.
【LCD screen display】The digital spoon scale is displayed on a large LCD screen with accurate readings, making it easier for users to read data.

【Tare function button】When placing containers or bags into the scoop of scale spoon, press button “TARE” to minus the tare back, than the screen display is set to zero. If there is no items in the digital spoon scale, press button “TARE” for zero correction function, the screen displays zero for starting weighing.

【Easy to use】The electronic measuring spoon has three function keys. Press button “ON/OFF” to boot after handling the digital weighing spoon in the horizontal position. When the weighing spoon is on, press and hold button “ON/OFF” for 3 seconds to shut off. Press button “MODE” for changing the weighing unit between g/oz/ct/gn. When the display is stable, press button “HOLD” to lock and display the weighing value.

about_this_item: KEEP YOUR UNFINISHED WINE FRESH! A bottle stopper is an amazingly simple gadget that will nonetheless save the day in your fridge. When the original cork simply won’t go back into the bottle, wine bottle stoppers come to the rescue: they prolong the noble drink’s life and keep the flavors sealed inside for the next time you open the bottle. Bottle stoppers don’t have to be boring, though: this one’s shaped like a sombrero, adding a sense of chill to your bottle.

LEAKPROOF AND SAFE. This silicone wine stopper reliably seals the bottle, making it airtight and preventing the wine itself or its volatile aromas from escaping. Silicone bottle caps are a particularly good choice in that they are flexible and can fit different bottles. These cute wine stoppers can also act as champagne stoppers: keep the bubbles in! The material that each wine plug in the set is made of is also food grade, BPA-free, and dishwasher-safe: healthy and convenient!

FOR MORE THAN WINE BOTTLES! Find more uses for this reusable wine cork: use for plugging other suitable spirits (Tequila anyone ?!), non-alcoholic drinks, champagne too and general use glass bottles (used for oil, sauces or other condiments). This decorative wine stopper will add charm and whimsy to any Mexican based meals or snacks. Your Tacos and Nachos will feel at home with the beautiful sombrero design and your bottles will look great in the fridge or on a shelf.

FOCUS ON FUN & FUNCTIONALITY. We at Monkey Business like to design unique kitchen gadgets that will liven up your kitchen, diversify your culinary repertoire, and make spending time in the kitchen more fun. We develop cute kitchen gadgets and funny kitchen gadgets (because it’s amazing how those simple things can make their owners and their owners’ dinner guests smile), but we never compromise functionality: our practical and cool gadgets can become your helpful assistants.

MAKES A PERFECT GIFT. Wine stoppers (funny ones especially) make a humble yet charming gift for anyone who enjoys an occasional glass of wine , a burrito every so often or likes a smile everytime they have a bottle that needs plugging. Developed by Beanie bottle stopper designers, Monkey Business kitchen gadgets have won international industrial design awards for delivering clever and imaginative solutions. This cute wine stopper will surely be appreciated by wine lovers among your friends.

Some streaming videos or shows (Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney) are protected by copyright and not play properly.

If the video has no sound, most of it is because the video is Dolby Sound. Like other projectors on the market, the projector does not support Dolby Audio. If the video has no sound, please turn off Dolby Audio.
(Approximate path: Settings > Display and Sound > Audio > Dolby Digital Out > Dolby Digital (off)).

Please check if your phone has video output function first. Some phones such as Samsung A series and Xiaomi do not have video output function. Due to Google Phone's special privacy agreement, please connect the projector viaChromecast.

The Mini Projector supports USB2.0 (black) USB flash drives (up to 64GB), please check the file system format of the USB flash drive on your computer. The projector supports USB flash drives with "NTFS" and "FAT32" system file formats but does not support "exFAT".
The Mini Projector does not require batteries and must always be connected to a power source to function properly.

Small and Portable: Mini video projector is small and portable, and can be carried in a pocket or bag. Even children can hold it easily. You can enjoy movies, videos and games no matter at home or in the outdoor courtyard, travel, camping and other location.

Multiple Interface: Phone and tablet screens can be mirrored using a data cable. Small projector is equipped with multiple ports, including Type-C, HDMI, USB, audio and other interfaces. It can be easily connected to multiple media devices, such as TV boxes, laptops, desktopcomputers, digital cameras, HDMI-enabled devices to play video, TV series, photos sharing and games etc.

about_this_item: First-Class 36W Speakers, 3D DoIby Audio, Bidirectional Bluetooth 5.2- The AURZEN BOOM 3 is a revolutionary projector that takes your audio experience to the next level. Equipped with powerful 36W speakers and genuine DoIby 3D audio, it delivers crisp highs, robust midranges, and booming bass, making it a standout choice in its class. Whether you’re watching movies, gaming, or enjoying music, the audio quality rivals that of premium thousand-dollar projectors. Plus, with bidirectional Bluetooth 5.2, the BOOM 3 can also be used as a standalone speaker, offering versatility beyond just projection.

Smart System with Officially-Licensed Apps- This 4K projector is built in with advanced smart TV OS, giving you access to over 1,000,000 videos. Pre-loaded with certified apps like NetfIix, Prime Video, and YouTube, you can start streaming your favorite movies and TV shows with just one click on the remote. Plus, with the Open Browser and built-in App Store, you can easily download all your favorite apps—no need for external TV sticks or additional devices.

Intelligent Screen Adaptation- The AURZEN BOOM 3 projector 4k is equipped with advanced AI focus technology and 9 directional gyros for instant, precise auto-focus and crystal-clear images. Its 6D keystone correction automatically adjusts the screen from any angle, while the zoom function lets you resize the image from 50% to 100% without needing to move the projector. What sets it apart is its unique intelligent obstacle avoidance and screen alignment feature, which automatically adjusts the image to fit perfectly, even when obstacles are detected, saving you time and ensuring optimal viewing without the hassle.

Native 1080P 60Hz, +100% Brightness, HDR10- The AURZEN projector delivers unmatched brightness, far exceeding other brands with just 700 ANSI Lumens. Supporting 4K decoding and featuring a native 1920 x 1080p resolution, this projector provides exceptional clarity, vivid colors, and incredible contrast with every detail. Thanks to the latest HDR10 technology, you'll experience enhanced image quality for both indoor and outdoor viewing.

Multiple Installation Options & Wide Device Compatibility- This home projector offers flexible installation options, including ceiling, tabletop, tripod, and wall mounts, thanks to its 1/4" screw hole at the bottom—perfect for any setup. With 2 HDMI ports, 2 USB ports, and a 3.5mm headphone jack, it’s compatible with a variety of devices like Fire TV Stick, Roku, laptops, iPhones, Android devices, iPads, USB drives, Nintendo Switch/PS5, and more. Whether you're hosting indoor movie nights, small meetings, outdoor camping, gaming sessions, parties, learning events, or business presentations, the BOOM 3 is your all-in-one solution.

5G+2.4G Dual-Band WiFi & Leading Service- The TV projector features 5G and 2.4G dual-band WiFi for fast, stable connections to your phone or computer, ensuring smooth, lag-free wireless projection. Say goodbye to delays and interruptions during streaming or gaming. Besides, be confident of our quality, we offer 1-year replacement and 3-Year repair, together with lifetime professional technical support. If you have any questions when use the projector, please email us and we will provide you with the solutions within 24 business hours.

Auto Focus & Keystone correction(with built-in 2024 latest sensor) can achieve perfect image alignment and sharp visuals at any time, ensuring a hassle-free and unparalleled viewing experience both indoors and outdoors.

🥇【First Innovation: Compatible With Alexa Voice Control + Warranty&Technical Support】 Yaber home cinema 4k projector seamlessly integrates with Alexa, offering effortless voice control and automation for an enhanced entertainment experience. Control your home projector, access apps with just your voice. Any problem please be free to contact our after-sale email, Yaber professional team offers 24/7 service 6-Month back and 3-Year repair, lifetime technical support.
